attributes.action: give a free laptop or pda to every student in the UK for use in school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would include children in infants, juniors and comprehensive schools. The equipment would be given to the children to take home to do homework etc. The equipment would be given back to the education department at the end of their school life or could be bought off the department of education for however much it would be worth at that moment in time. There are laptops nowadays that cost £50, they use them in africa!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
